TopicTitle: Please help me understand why this isn't working

Articles.Content:
For the life of me i don't know why this tiny little spaceplane/booster/shuttle  wont launch properly. I've tried everything and searched for the answer on how to build a little shuttle properly but most the tutorials are all about a Space Shuttle Replica. I basically know what i'm supposed to do to even it out but when i do it it fixes nothing it just always starts flipping around right off the pad. Please help me.  

Edit: Let me rephrase that. I THOUGHT i knew how to build it but apparently I don't.

Edited November 22, 2016 by DanTheMan96
That thrust direction doesn't look like pointing to CoM to me. How much torque does your RCS build aid show?

You have way too much pre-built gimbal, your boosters appear to be angled the wrong way, and I don't think the Reliant has the gimbal range to properly fly through its range. Try a single/pair of Thuds and cap the end of the shuttle with a nose cone of some kind.

Quote
14 hours ago, foamyesque said:

You have way too much pre-built gimbal, your boosters appear to be angled the wrong way, and I don't think the Reliant has the gimbal range to properly fly through its range. Try a single/pair of Thuds and cap the end of the shuttle with a nose cone of some kind.

 

21 hours ago, FancyMouse said:

That thrust direction doesn't look like pointing to CoM to me. How much torque does your RCS build aid show?

 

thanks guys i was able to get it working. I was just really confused about what the guides where saying about the the thrust pointing towards the CoM.
